text: aur paraspar milakar jihaad karo allaah ke maarg mein, jaisa ki jihaad ka haq hai. usane tumhen chun liya hai - aur dharm ke maamale mein tumapar koee tangee aur kathinaee nahin rakhee. tumhaare baap ibaraaheem ke panth ko tumhaare lie pasand kiya. usane isase pahale tumhaara naam muslim (aagyaakaaree) rakha tha aur is dhyey se - taaki rasool tumapar gavaah ho aur tum logon par gavaah ho. atah namaaz ka aayojan karo aur zakaat do aur allaah ko mazabootee se pakade raho. vahee tumhaara sanrakshak hai. to kya hee achchha sanrakshak hai aur kya hee achchha sahaayak
